sections.title: About
body: Battle between other players in real time to test who's computer is ready for combat in this multiplayer match three deck building strategy game
Match components on the board representing the needed components of a computer from CPU to Network Packets to charge your cards and destroy your opponents computer
Play by pressing the button below!

sections.title: Inspiration and Related Works
body: This project was inspired by the game "Gems of War" and its gameplay. I orginally wanted to create bots for Gems of War to improve them, however Gems of War does not have well supported API to allow bots. ( Cheating Prevention )

I am currently writing about the extensibility of online puzzle games for my Honors Thesis at New College of Florida. Looking at other related works such as Candy Crush, Gems of War, and Hearthstone has been proven useful in thinking about how to design a puzzle game with extensibility in mind.

sections.title: Development Architecture
body: Created with libGDX and Java. Assets are custom made and created with Aseprite.
Currently hosted with DigitalOcean Droplets and Docker Images
A MySQL Database hosted on Amazon Web Services ( AWS )
